name: Tranquility Bay Beach House Resort

reviews.text: Family had stayed here recently. Glad we listened to their recommendation and booked here as well. Did not want to stay in Key West, so this property in Marathon was perfect. Excellent grounds, putting green, tiki bar, beachfront and cafe. Our cottage is gracefully furnished, overlooking the pool and beach. Recommend!!!
reviews.title: Beautiful setting! Excellent staff throughout the resort!

reviews.text: Hubby, Mom and I stayed here last year in the fall. September is a great time to visit the keys, low tourist time of year and great savings on super places to stay, like this one. We stayed in a three bed, handicap accessible town home overlooking the adult pool. Best part about this hotel is the beautiful view of sunsets from the "beach" tiki bar area, second best is the huge family pool and quiet, relaxing adult pool, third best is the spacious town homes. We really enjoyed our stay here, and Mom and I wanted to stay permanently! We will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Wonderful experience, highly recommended

reviews.text: After serveral hours for sat nav direction's on the Florida turnpike and the oversea's highway we stumble across Tranquility Bay Beach House Resort.Book the room open the door to the room and booked several more nights.Thank you very much for a highlight of our first trip to America from Melbourne Australia.The resort was just off high season so it was quite for booked in guests beautiful sunsets , well appointed very clean rooms.
reviews.title: Beautiful Thank you Excellent Quality accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We shall return, and we will be recommend to all our Florida US visiting friends.
reviews.title: Amazing trip!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you to all the staff for our very pleasant stay .
reviews.title: True to name

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Love this place! 3 couples traveling for a quick get away from the cold weather. Heard about this place from friend. We stayed in Unit #66 which I would highly recommend. It is in end unit with a handicap shower and larger bedroom on the ground floor and two bedrooms with bath on the second level. Marathon is a mellow place that has beautiful water (views from this Hotel), quaint eateries with the freshest seafood you'll find. Tranquility has two pools (one for adults only which we liked), water sports and several putting greens. Nice porches w/ Adirondack chairs made for a very relaxing few days. If you want the hustle of Key West drive there (about one hour)..then return to paradise at Tranquility Bay.
reviews.title: Tranquility Bay earns it's name!
Terrible Experience at Hotel Restaurant
reviews.text: Last Friday was my husband’s birthday and I have chosen The Tranquility Bay Hotel (where restaurant is located) since we thought it would be a good place to stay and dine to celebrate.

We drove almost 3 hours from Weston and when arriving at the hotel that night, we had a terrible welcome. After getting in the hotel, with my husband and my 2 boys, we arrived at the restaurant for dinner at 9:07pm. The hostess (unfortunately cannot remember her name) was very unpleasant and told us the restaurant was already closed (7 minutes ago). The restaurant was full and I explained that we were staying at the hotel, that we drove 3 hours, it was a very important celebration for us and on the top of that, my kids were starving. But she denied to serve us.
reviews.title: The BEST place EVER!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I started imagining where we could find any descent food / place around there. She has not even said “I am sorry” … or has shown any “commotion” about the situation. After insisting a lot she went inside to – according to her –ask her manager. The answer was “no” again. Now here comes the worst part. She has offered us they could prepare our dinner and serve at our room because they would not have a waitress to serve us at the restaurant. WHAT????
reviews.title: Tranquility? .....no

reviews.text: We couldn’t believe and end up leaving very disappointed. You can imagine the type of night we end up having by eating in an awful place with poor and oily food close to the hotel (recommended as one of the other options there).
reviews.title: More than we expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tranquility Bay for a week in November proved a rewarding and happy stay. The development is little advertised and that was very surprising, as it seemed to us to be one of the best resorts in the Marathon Area.
reviews.title: Quietly sophisticated Marathon area resort at a good price

reviews.text: We had a two bedroom two-floor water view unit, which was amply sized and contained every amenity we could have wanted. All the units are finished in white with covered verandas at the rear, facing the beach, both upstairs and downstairs. The guest parking was convenient and free.
reviews.title: Amazing
Awesome getaway
reviews.text: The kitchen appliances were very modern and comprehensive, with nice granite worktops and a big fridge freezer. Our unit was serviced every day and we were provided with fresh bath towels and pool towels.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We dined once at the Butterfly in the evening and that was a good experience, with high quality food in a fine-dining setting.
reviews.title: Tremendous value

reviews.text: The beach is lovely, as are the two pools, which were never overly crowded or noisy. There is a bar right on the beach, which also served lunchtime snacks. Drinks were good, the food not so wonderful, but okay for quick snack.
reviews.title: Relaxing getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are a bit late in reviewing not in remembering what a wonderful place Tranquility Bay is. We have never stayed any place where the name so totally fits. Tranquility Bay was so relaxing, peaceful, and beautiful. They originally had us in a house by the larger family pool and being just two adults we asked if anything was available by the other quieter pool. The woman checking us it was very kind and moved us to the quieter area. It was wonderful! The house was beautiful with great views from the porches and deck. The interior was immaculate and nicely decorated. Tranquility Bay truly lives up to it's name!
reviews.title: Perfectly Name

reviews.text: Spent a long weekend in late October accompanied by my 2 grandchildren. Arrived at the hotel at 12noon knowing full well we were way too early but thought at least we would get our names on the list. Otis, the front desk clerk, immediately and in a very curt sort of manner read us "the fine print" about a 4pm check-in despite my having no expectation a room would be available at the early hour we were there.
reviews.title: Don't forget to have your attorney on hand at check-in!
Fantastic resort and facilities
reviews.text: We were told we could use the pool pending readiness of our room but the only changing facilities for changing were the washrooms off the lobby. So my two grandchildren changed in my SUV for lack of anywhere else.

When the room was finally ready around 3pm, imagine my surprise having too complete a check-in "document" I will call it that required me to "initial" in 5 different places about things I was agreeing to in addition to a general signature at the end. 63 years on this earth traveling the world regularly for the last 43 and never have I seen anything like this. More like a car rental contract. Combined with "the fine print" intro and then this document which assumes you are a potential criminal planning to do all kinds of bad things at Tranquility Bay, you are signing your life away to them!
reviews.title: Tranquility Beach House and Resort

reviews.text: In fairness our 3 bedroom townhouse was pretty impressive (excepting the soiled great room furniture) and the dinners we enjoyed on the outdoor terrace of the Butterfly Café outstanding. That said, breakfast is not served there and you either have to drive to a restaurant in the area or purchase the fixings at Publix and then fix for yourself each morning.
reviews.title: great experience.

aka: Tranquility Bay Beach House Hotel Marathon
description: Middle Keys' Luxury Resort. Endless sunshine, natural beauty, and glorious sunsets. Tranquility Bay brings Singh Resorts' signature "Conch-style" resort setting to the fabulous Florida Keys - redefining luxury accommodations in the historic Florida city. Each of our luxury resort's 85 spacious houses come with the finest amenities, including gourmet kitchens, private porches with waterfront views, plasma TVs in the living rooms and original art inspired by the Florida Keys.
